Class QuestionActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • ca.ualberta.cmput301f14t16.easya.View.SecureActivity
              • ca.ualberta.cmput301f14t16.easya.View.QuestionActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, MainView<Question>

    public class QuestionActivity
extends SecureActivity
implements MainView<Question>
    An Activity subclass that displays a question page. It provides a UI that allows the user to view a question, its replies and answers, open its answers, favourite it, reply to it, etc.
    Author:
    Cauani
